channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: To Love Math, Kids Should Start Older And Encounter Its Beauty
item.description: Math is something to enjoy. It is not a tool that will make you rich or a box to check for college admissions.

item.title: Ted Cruz Should Move On From Sunday School Geopolitics
item.description: If you're going to let your vague memory of a Sunday school slogan guide your foreign policy aims, make sure what you learned was correct.

item.title: Georgia’s Fiscal Responsibility Is a Lesson for Washington
item.description: If Congress is looking for a model of fiscal sanity, it could do worse than to study Georgia.

item.title: 'I'm watching': Trump warns against oil price increases
item.description: President Trump warned oil-producing nations on Monday to keep prices down and ordered his team to increase domestic production immediately, as the wo...

item.title: The Iraqi Bishop Who Saw Life for What It Is
item.description: Loving and serving God and His Creation — even during genocide.

item.title: With Abortion And Euthanasia Votes, The U.K. Rejects The Basis Of Every Human Freedom
item.description: Once a nation ceases to respect the source of human dignity, it doesn't take long to stop respecting the rights that dignity demands.

item.title: Why Is Congress Abandoning One of the Best Health Insurance Reforms in a Generation?
item.description: The Senate has dropped the House’s expansion of health savings accounts (HSAs) from its version of the Republicans’ tax bill. This is a serious error.

item.title: Regime change? White House says Iranian people control their destiny
item.description: The White House said Monday the people of Iran will determine who leads them, but President Trump raised a "good question" about whether they will cho...

item.title: Budget Office Estimates Biden Border Bedlam Cost States Billions
item.description: The Biden-era chaos posed ramifications far beyond our southern border, and Washington must take every effort to ensure that it never recurs.

item.title: Every Church Needs A Security Plan Fortified By The Second Amendment
item.description: Until Jesus comes back, churches should anticipate the persistence of crime, tragedy, and death and arm themselves accordingly.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Is a Public Menace
item.description: He is not merely the worst choice on offer in New York’s mayoral race; he is unacceptable under any circumstances.

item.title: Conservative commentator Mark Levin slams Marjorie Taylor Greene's opposition to Iran strikes
item.description: Fox News commentator Mark Levin derided Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene as a "shameless nitwit" over her opposition to President Trump's strike on Iran's ...

item.title: Trump receives praise from GOP opponents for strike in Iran
item.description: Some Republican opponents of President Trump are praising his decision to send B-2 bombers into Iran Saturday to strike three key nuclear sites.

item.title: President Badass
item.description: The legend of Donald Trump grows.

item.title: Trump tests the limits of MAGA faithful by bombing Iran
